page.title: 18A Day In My Life (1)
page.content: On{Saturdays}I wake up at about 8.00 a.m. and have breakfast. Then my brothers and I go, with my Mum, down to the{harbour}to load one of the fishing boats with ice. We work with the skipper's son while my Mum goes to her work. The first job is to get 350 fish boxes aboard. This is done with the help if a{hydraulic crane,}but it's still hard work. Next ice comes down a chute from the{jetty ice {factory,}and it is shovelled down to the freezer room. When the morning's work is finished we all go and have dinner at the skipper's house, and after a while Mum comes and we all go home. The rest of the afternoon I spend{riding bikes}with my next door neighbour and my Dad until it's time for tea. In the evening I{read}or {watch television}until bedtime.
